channel.title: Bandos boss random yell
channel.description:
How can I make it so my bandos boss randomly yells... things like raaaawrrrr and raaaaaaarwgg
Not the same text everytime and every 15 secs he says something
thanks

item.title: Bandos boss random yell
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

[quote=“mod_lol1, post:3, topic:320765”]Compiling... client.java:17846: cannot find symbol symbol : variable npcType location: class client if (npcType == 1) { ^ client.java:17847: cannot find symbol symbol : variable IsUnderAttack location: class client if (IsUnderAttack) { ^ client.java:17848: cannot find symbol symbol : method requestText(java.lang.String) location: class client requestText(randomBandosText()); ^ 3 errors Druk op een toets om door te gaan. . .
im using battlescape, for what source is this?[/quote]

The class is most likely misc.

item.title: Bandos boss random yell
item.dc:creator: @Owned_Pl0xs Owned_Pl0xs
item.description:
@Owned_Pl0xs wrote:

Process:

if (npcType == IDOFNPC) { if (IsUnderAttack) { requestText(randomBandosText()); } }

String randomBandosText() { if (Misc.random(50) == 25) return "YOUR MESSAGE"; else if (Misc.random(50) == 24) return "ANOTHER MESSAGE"; else if (Misc.random(50) == 23) return "ANOTHER MESSAGE"; else if (Misc.random(50) == 22) return "ANOTHER MESSAGE"; else if (Misc.random(50) == 21) return "ANOTHER MESSAGE"; else return ""; }

Read full topic
